title: Mastering change: management and leadership skills for turbulent times
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Change (Psychology)
description: Designed to assist managers in the implementation of change and to ensure that employees deal with change effectively. Part 1 examines management and leadership issues and understanding the processes involved in organisational change. Part 2 looks at planning for change rather than allowing it to happen suddenly. Part 3 presents the "4 C's" involved in managing the implementation of change. Part 4 highlights the issues involved in leading a team into the future. A handbook accompanies the series with exercises to reinforce relevant points.
